rules_text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance
[i]Sisterhood[/i] – Other creatures you control with flying have first strike and vigilance.
[i]Triangle Attack[/i] – Whenever Shanna, Juno & Thea attack, draw a card, tap up to one target creature, and support 3.
[i]Wings Hope[/i] – Whenever a counter is put onto a creature you control, they gain flying until end of turn.
